name: durusuna-backend
description: Backend API for Durusuna school communication app. Set DB_RESET_MODE=true to reset database on startup.

scripts.start: if [ "$DB_RESET_MODE" = "true" ]; then echo 'ðŸ”¥ DB_RESET_MODE detected - Running database reset...'; bun run db:force-reset; echo 'âœ… Database reset completed - Starting server...'; fi && bun src/server.ts
scripts.start:seed: bun scripts/migrate.ts seed && echo 'Seeding completed, container will exit'
scripts.db:reset: bun run db:rollback:all && bun run db:migrate && bun run db:seed
scripts.db:force-reset: bun scripts/reset.ts && bun run db:migrate && bun run db:seed
scripts.start:reset: echo 'ðŸ”¥ Starting with database reset...' && bun run db:force-reset && echo 'âœ… Database reset completed - Starting server...' && bun src/server.ts
scripts.docker:db:reset: docker compose run --rm backend bun knex migrate:rollback --all --knexfile src/knexfile.ts && docker compose run --rm backend bun knex migrate:latest --knexfile src/knexfile.ts && docker compose run --rm backend bun knex seed:run --knexfile src/knexfile.ts
scripts.docker:seed: docker compose run --rm backend bun knex seed:run --knexfile src/knexfile.ts
scripts.docker:migrate: docker compose run --rm backend bun knex migrate:latest --knexfile src/knexfile.ts
scripts.docker:dev: docker compose up postgres redis -d && bun run docker:db:reset && docker compose up backend -d
